briefTitle: A Study Evaluating the Safety of Elexacaftor/Tezacaftor/Ivacaftor in Participants With Cystic Fibrosis (CF)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Key Inclusion Criteria:

* Completed study drug treatment in parent study (VX19-445-117 \[NCT04599465\] or VX20-445-126 \[NCT04969224\]), or had study drug interruption(s) in parent study but completed study visits up to the last scheduled visit of the treatment period in the parent study

Key Exclusion Criteria:

* History of drug intolerance in a parent study

Other protocol defined Inclusion/Exclusion criteria may apply.

outcomeMeasures.title: Safety and Tolerability as Assessed by Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)

commonTop: Infective pulmonary exacerbation of cystic fibrosis
